title: Ability to login to the Nexus Repo Manager from https://nexus.imgur.com/

profile.name: Imgur
profile.about: The most awesome images on the Internet.

vulnerability_information:
Hello Imgur Administrators,

I am not sure if this falls in your scope but I wanted to alert you that your Nexus Repository Manager can be accessed through https://nexus.imgur.com/
Usually the default user/pass for the NRM are admin/admin123 but there is an alternative way to login using the below default credentials.
user: anonymous
pass: anonymous

I was able to login and I got access to check all the repositories available. I uploaded the attached video as a proof of traversal.
Kindly arrange to remove the user anonymous or change its password & limit the access to the Nexus Repo Manager site https://nexus.imgur.com/

## Impact

The attacker can manage to proxy, collect, and manage your dependencies (delete components & Analyze applications).

activities.message: Hello! Thanks for taking the time to make this report to the Imgur security team! We look forward to reviewing and assessing the risk of this vuln. In the meantime, we ask that you sit tight while we get to it - we're a small team and sometimes it takes us a while to verify all reports. Please don't ask for updates as these take time and effort away from the reports we're working through and make our response time slower across the board. Thanks - we'll be in touch soon!
activities.markdown_message: Hello! Thanks for taking the time to make this report to the Imgur security team! We look forward to reviewing and assessing the risk of this vuln. In the meantime, we ask that you sit tight while we get to it - we're a small team and sometimes it takes us a while to verify all reports. Please don't ask for updates as these take time and effort away from the reports we're working through and make our response time slower across the board. Thanks - we'll be in touch soon!

activities.message: We have accepted the report as valid and added an issue in our internal issue tracker for your report. We will update this page when more progress is made. Thanks!
activities.markdown_message: We have accepted the report as valid and added an issue in our internal issue tracker for your report. We will update this page when more progress is made. Thanks!

activities.message: Hello candysaur and thank you for your message. Is there any update so far or how long could this take ? I can see from my side that the password has been changed for the user Anonymous :) which is good news !
activities.markdown_message: Hello candysaur and thank you for your message. Is there any update so far or how long could this take ? I can see from my side that the password has been changed for the user Anonymous :) which is good news !

activities.message: Hello @sbakhour. You are right - it looks like they have changed the password for the account. I will close the ticket. a bounty should be paid out fairly soon. Thank you for your help!
activities.markdown_message: Hello @sbakhour. You are right - it looks like they have changed the password for the account. I will close the ticket. a bounty should be paid out fairly soon. Thank you for your help!

activities.message: We have released a new version that fixes this vulnerability. Thanks for helping make Imgur more secure!
activities.markdown_message: We have released a new version that fixes this vulnerability. Thanks for helping make Imgur more secure!

activities.message:
My pleasure :) appreciated. I am glad to know that a fix has been applied. 
Awaiting for the bounty ! Meanwhile, may we disclose the report if possible, or the disclosure step is after the bounty?
activities.markdown_message:
My pleasure :) appreciated. I am glad to know that a fix has been applied.
Awaiting for the bounty ! Meanwhile, may we disclose the report if possible, or the disclosure step is after the bounty?

activities.message: You should be able to submit an official request for disclosure here. From what I can see, you should be able to click on the "Add comment" button to bring up the drop-down menu and select "Request public disclosure." I am not the one that approves those requests, but I can try to stay on top of my teammates so they review your request. Thanks.
activities.markdown_message: You should be able to submit an official request for disclosure here. From what I can see, you should be able to click on the "Add comment" button to bring up the drop-down menu and select "Request public disclosure." I am not the one that approves those requests, but I can try to stay on top of my teammates so they review your request. Thanks.

activities.message:
Hello candysaur, Yeah I can do this but may I disclose the report please after the Bounty ?
Any idea when the bounty will be given ? Thanks :)
activities.markdown_message:
Hello candysaur, Yeah I can do this but may I disclose the report please after the Bounty ?
Any idea when the bounty will be given ? Thanks :)

activities.message: Disclosures are approved separately from giving out bounties. I don't approve either, so I can't say for certain when either will happen. This report should already be in review for the bounty, but the review for public disclosure won't start until a formal request is submitted and probably won't be approved until after the bounty is given.
activities.markdown_message: Disclosures are approved separately from giving out bounties. I don't approve either, so I can't say for certain when either will happen. This report should already be in review for the bounty, but the review for public disclosure won't start until a formal request is submitted and probably won't be approved until after the bounty is given.

activities.message: Hello Imgur Team, a gentle reminder. Any news concerning the bounty ? Thank you :-)
activities.markdown_message: Hello Imgur Team, a gentle reminder. Any news concerning the bounty ? Thank you :-)

activities.message:
Hello @sbakhour,

This finding is technically out of scope and poses no risk to Imgur, but due to an internal miscommunication on our end, we will pay a $50 bounty.

Thank you!
activities.markdown_message:

Thank you!

activities.message: Thank you for the bounty ! Appreciated :)
